EmailTemplate.name: FW: MBO Partners Enrollment Information - Urgent - Please complete ASAP! (136510
EmailTemplate.subject: FW: MBO Partners Enrollment Information - Urgent - Please complete ASAP! (1365106723.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Keith, Please use the link below to log in and complete the online enrollment as soon as possible. At the end, an I-9 will populate; you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I don’t need a hard copy.) I will also need you to send me a copy of your US passport (you can just take a picture with your phone and email that to me.) Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions. This needs to be done ASAP so we can provide your client t with needed security information. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com> Sent: Thursday, April 04, 2013 3:47:00 PM (UTC-05:00) Eastern Time (US & Canada) To: rags14382@yahoo.com <mailto:rags14382@yahoo.com> Subject: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Dear Keith, Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become an MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. - Please begin enrollment by clicking here <https://app1.mbopartners.com/web/join/link?display=PersonalInfo&ec=MBOMBE&reset=true&cd=10A6C339879811B4E5E680>. - Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions. - At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns.
We look forward to working with you. Regards, Nicolette TaylorEnrollment Manager Direct: 703-793-6281 Toll Free: 800-556-0270MBO Partners13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300Herndon, VA 20171http://www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com%20>Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
